name: Hentai Puzzle Sim
description:
Hentai Puzzle Sim is an exciting puzzle game which you need to put together pictures of beautiful anime girls, using scattered picture fragments on the screen.
Can you complete them all and discover the beautiful images that are waiting for you?
Let yourself be captivated by the beautiful anime girls, along with the wonderful music, in order to have a pleasant experience when solving the different puzzles.
20 levels all completely different, where you can discover different outfits, and every time the characters have fewer clothes, you may even get a surprise.
As you unlock the following puzzles, you will also have access to the full images in the CG Gallery tab.
Enjoy the excellent music while you solve the puzzles, relax and have a nice time while trying to solve all the puzzles.
